divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a v-shaped object, with no flashing lights just soft pink lights. It floated above me coming from the 5 north at very fast rate of speed. I saw this object 5 times within 1 ur. And 15 minutes. The last time I saw this object I could see it had a body that seemed blackbut shiney. One time it flew overhead with only .one light on, on it's left sideand several on the right. Another time an orb or flash of light left the formation at high rate of speed. I have been a stargazer most of my life and I have never seen the skies so busy with unusual lights over Amarillo like the last month.these objects lasted only seconds visibilityas they moved quickly and suddenly vanish.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Amarillo
There were no other sightings in Amarillo on or around September 23rd 2013
Summary: saw v-shape object, no flashing lights, pink lights, no less than 5 times directly overhead, amount of lights differ each time
